response.overview: Energy, the equivalent of mass; a radical conceptions, key to the atomic age.  The idea expressed in E-MC^2 is actually quite simple.  But it has caused a great revolution in scientific thinking.  It means any object, a desk, a pencil, a piece of paper, just any bit of matter represents an unbelievable amount of energy.  God of the Atom addresses man's spiritual bankruptcy and his need for regeneration.
response.title: God of the Atom
